info.title: Recipe Management API
info.description: API for managing recipes, users, and meal plans.

get.description: Get user public information (name) by ID.

put.description: Update user profile. Users can update themselves; Admins can update anyone.

delete.description: Delete a user account. Admin only.

get.description: List all active users. Admin only.

schema.title: Response List Active Users Auth Users Get

post.description:
Endpoint to log in a user and get an access token.
Rate limited to 5 attempts per minute per IP address.
Account is locked for 15 minutes after 5 failed attempts.

Submit a request for a new user account.
Rate limited to 3 requests per minute per IP address.

Note: Always returns 202 Accepted to prevent user enumeration attacks.
The same response is returned whether or not the email is already registered.

get.description: List all pending account requests. Admin only.

schema.title: Response List Pending Requests Auth Pending Requests Get

post.description: Approve a pending account request and create the user. Admin only.
Reset a user's password and set is_first_login to True. Admin only.
Create a new recipe for the currently authenticated user.

get.description:
Retrieve a list of all recipes with optional filtering and sorting.
Filters: field[eq]=value, field[gt]=value, etc.
Sort: sort=field1,-field2
Retrieve unique values for a specific field for metadata usage.

schema.title: Response Get Meta Values Recipes Meta  Field  Get

get.description: Retrieve a single recipe by its ID.

put.description: Update a recipe. Only the owner of the recipe can perform this action.

delete.description: Delete a recipe. Only the owner of the recipe can perform this action.

post.description: Add a comment to a recipe.

schema.title: Response Read Comments Recipes  Recipe Id  Comments Get

put.description: Update a comment. Only the author of the comment or an admin can update it.

delete.description: Delete a comment. Only the author of the comment or an admin can delete it.

schema.title: Response Get Meal Templates Meals Templates Get

get.description: Root endpoint to check if the API is running.

SearchCriterion.title: SearchCriterion
SearchCriterion.description: A single search criterion for meal template SEARCH strategy.
